dathanda abiramda owunge bharyawoda owunge puthrayoda owunge labalayoda pitathata awuth thamunge kudaram dorakada langa sitiyoya. 28 mosesda: me siyalu kriya karana pinisa swaminwahanse ma ewu bawa meyin oba sama danagannahuya; maknisada eewa magema kalpanawen nokelemi. 29 siyalu minisunta poduwu maranayakin me manushyayan marunoth nohoth siyalu minisunta siddhawana de mowunta siddhawunoth swaminwahanse ma noewuseka. 30 numuth swaminwahanse amuthu deyak kaloth, bhumiya age mukhaya ara owun santhaka siyalla samanga owun gilagaththoth, owun panapitin pathalayata giyoth, me manushyayan wisin swaminwahanse heladakka bawa oba sama danagannawa athayi kiweya. 31 thawada ohu me siyalu wachana kiya nimawu wita owun yata thibunu bhumiya dekata palunaya. 32 polowa age mukhaya ara owunda owunge pawulda korata ayithi siyalu manushyayanda owunge siyalu sampathda gilagaththaya. 33 mese owhuda owunta ayithi siyalloda panapitin pathalayata kinda giyoya.
